title: An Act protecting victims of childhood sexual abuse and holding perpetrators accountable

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Roy of Franklin, a petition (subject to Joint Rule 12) of Jeffrey N. Roy relative to legal protections for victims of childhood sexual abuse.  The Judiciary.
